headline: International Flavors And Fragrances Uses WEF Stage To Support Turnaround
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) is taking part in the World Economic Forum, engaging with global business and policy leaders. The appearance comes during a period of declining sales and financial pressures for the company. Management is using the event to discuss industry trends, potential partnerships, and approaches to ongoing operational challenges. IFF operates at the center of the global flavors, fragrances, and ingredients market, supplying consumer goods makers across...
